defaultRecipe.name: Air Fried Pizza
defaultRecipe.description: Greek Yogurt Crust Pizza
instructions: Combine dry ingredients and mix
Add yogurt and kneed until well mixed, then spread to pizza crust shape
Lightly coat air fryer with cooking oil and place dough inside
Fry at 400 for 8-10 minutes, flip and fry for another 3 minutes
Add sauce and toppings and fry until cheese is melted

defaultRecipe.name: Baked Potato
defaultRecipe.description: Air Fried Baked Potato
instructions: Wash and fully dry the potatoes before using a fork to poke holes around each potato
Spray each potato with a bit of cooking spray or brush with the olive oil and sprinkle with salt
Fry at 400 for 35-40 minutes, until soft

defaultRecipe.name: Potato Skins
defaultRecipe.description: Potato Skins from air fried baked potatoes
instructions: Wash and fully dry the potatoes before using a fork to poke holes around each potato
Spray each potato with a bit of cooking spray or brush with the olive oil and sprinkle with salt
Fry at 400 for 35-40 minutes, until soft
Fry bacon until crispy, then drain fat from fryer
Chop bacon and mix with butter, pepper, and 3/4 cup of cheddar
Scoop the insides out of the potatoes, leaving a thin layer inside the skins and fold into butter mixture
Fill skins with mixture and top with remaining cheese, fry until cheese is melted

defaultRecipe.name: Buffalo Chicken Thighs
defaultRecipe.description: Buffalo seasoned chicken thighs
instructions: Trim away any excess fat from the chicken thighs before coating the thighs in the olive oil
Mix the dry spices in a separate bowl before sprinkling over the chicken. Spread spices evenly on chicken
Air fry for 12-14 minutes at 375ºF or until the chicken reaches an internal temperature of 165ºF

defaultRecipe.name: Teriyaki Chicken Thighs
defaultRecipe.description: Sweet and salty teriyaki-style chicken thighs
instructions: Trim away any excess fat from the chicken thighs
Mix other ingredients and marinade for at least 30 minutes
Spray frying basket with cooking spray then air fry for 12-14 minutes at 375ºF or until the chicken reaches an internal temperature of 165ºF

defaultRecipe.name: Crispy Brussels Sprouts
defaultRecipe.description: Brussels Sprouts air fried to a crisp
instructions: Toss brussels sprouts in the olive oil and sprinkle with salt and pepper
Air fry for 24-28 minutes at 375ºF, shaking halfway through

defaultRecipe.name: Sweet Potato Fries
defaultRecipe.description: Spicy and crispy sweet potato fries
instructions: Wash and peel potatoes and cut into desired fry shape
Coat fries in oil
Mix dry ingredients and sprinkle most of the spices onto fries, saving about 1/4
Air fry at 400ºF for 16-20 minutes, shaking halfway through. Remove and toss in remaining spices

defaultRecipe.name: Classic Fries
defaultRecipe.description: Crispy and salty fries
instructions: Wash and peel potatoes and cut into desired fry shape
Coat fries in oil and sprinkle with salt
Air fry at 400ºF for 16-20 minutes, shaking halfway through
Sprinkle additional salt into potatoes before serving

defaultRecipe.name: Cajun Fries
defaultRecipe.description: Spicy cajun-seasoned fries
instructions: Wash and peel potatoes and cut into desired fry shape
Coat fries in oil
Mix dry ingredients and sprinkle most of the spices onto fries, saving about 1/4
Air fry at 400ºF for 16-20 minutes, shaking halfway through. Remove and toss in remaining spices

defaultRecipe.name: Garlic Parmesan Fries
defaultRecipe.description: Cheesy and salty fries
instructions: Wash and peel potatoes and cut into desired fry shape
Coat fries in oil
Mix remaining ingredients and sprinkle mixture onto fries, saving about 1/4
Air fry at 400ºF for 16-20 minutes, shaking halfway through. Remove and toss in remaining cheese and spice mix

defaultRecipe.name: Garlic Parmesan Chicken Bites
defaultRecipe.description: Unbreaded chicken nuggets with cheese and garlic
instructions: Pat diced chicken breast dry with a paper towel and add to a large bowl
Evenly coat the chicken in the olive oil
Mix seasoning blend in a separate bowl before adding to the chicken. Stir to evenly coat the chicken in the dry seasoning blend
Add the seasoned chicken to an air fryer basket. Air fry for 10-12 minutes at 400ºF until the chicken nuggets reach an internal temperature of 165ºF

defaultRecipe.name: Chipotle Lime Chicken Bites
defaultRecipe.description: Unbreaded chicken nuggets with zesty citrus twist
instructions: Pat diced chicken breast dry with a paper towel and add to a large bowl
Mix lime juice and seasoning blend in a separate bowl before adding to the chicken. Stir to evenly coat the chicken in the dry seasoning blend
Add the seasoned chicken to an air fryer basket. Air fry for 10-12 minutes at 400ºF until the chicken nuggets reach an internal temperature of 165ºF

defaultRecipe.name: Lemon Pepper Chicken Bites
defaultRecipe.description: Unbreaded chicken nuggets with a classic lemon flavor
instructions: Pat diced chicken breast dry with a paper towel and add to a large bowl
Mix lemon juice and seasoning blend in a separate bowl before adding to the chicken. Stir to evenly coat the chicken in the dry seasoning blend
Add the seasoned chicken to an air fryer basket. Air fry for 10-12 minutes at 400ºF until the chicken nuggets reach an internal temperature of 165ºF

defaultRecipe.name: Nashville Style Chicken Bites
defaultRecipe.description: Unbreaded chicken nuggets inspired by Music City
instructions: Pat diced chicken breast dry with a paper towel and add to a large bowl
Evenly coat the chicken in the olive oil
Mix seasoning blend in a separate bowl before adding to the chicken. Stir to evenly coat the chicken in the dry seasoning blend
Add the seasoned chicken to an air fryer basket. Air fry for 10-12 minutes at 400ºF until the chicken nuggets reach an internal temperature of 165ºF

defaultRecipe.name: Buttermilk Style Chicken Bites
defaultRecipe.description: Unbreaded chicken nuggets inspired by Chik Fil A
instructions: Pat diced chicken breast dry with a paper towel and add to a large bowl
Mix milk, pickle juice and seasoning blend in a separate bowl before adding to the chicken. Stir to evenly coat the chicken in the dry seasoning blend
Add the seasoned chicken to an air fryer basket. Air fry for 10-12 minutes at 400ºF until the chicken nuggets reach an internal temperature of 165ºF

defaultRecipe.name: Cajun Style Chicken Bites
defaultRecipe.description: Cajun seasoned unbreaded chicken nuggets
instructions: Pat diced chicken breast dry with a paper towel and add to a large bowl
Evenly coat the chicken in the olive oil
Mix seasoning blend in a separate bowl before adding to the chicken. Stir to evenly coat the chicken in the dry seasoning blend
Add the seasoned chicken to an air fryer basket. Air fry for 10-12 minutes at 400ºF until the chicken nuggets reach an internal temperature of 165ºF

defaultRecipe.name: Teriyaki Style Chicken Bites
defaultRecipe.description: Sweet and salty teriyaki-style chicken breast nuggets
instructions: Pat diced chicken breast dry with a paper towel and add to a large bowl
Evenly coat the chicken in the olive oil
Mix remaining in a separate bowl before adding to the chicken. Marinade for at least 30 minutes
Add the seasoned chicken to an air fryer basket. Air fry for 10-12 minutes at 400ºF until the chicken nuggets reach an internal temperature of 165ºF

defaultRecipe.name: Chicken Katsu
defaultRecipe.description: Panko-breaded chicken breast
instructions: Pound or slice chicken breast so it is thin
Crack and mix eggs, add salt and pepper to flour in a separate bowl
Coat chicken in flour, then egg, then panko
Air fry at 400 for 15 minutes, flipping halfway through

defaultRecipe.name: Tortilla Pizza
defaultRecipe.description: Low calorie pizza with a tortilla crust
instructions: Optional: toast tortilla in air fryer at 400 for 1 minute
Top tortilla with sauce, cheese, and desired toppings. Air fry until cheese is melted, about 5 minutes

defaultRecipe.name: 3-ingredient Crust Pizza
defaultRecipe.description: Low calorie pizza with a greek yogurt crust
instructions: Combine dry ingredients and mix thoroughly, then add greek yogurt and kneed into dough
Lightly coat air fryer with cooking oil and place dough inside
Fry at 400 for 8-10 minutes, flip and fry for another 3 minutes
Add sauce and toppings and fry until cheese is melted, about 5 minutes

defaultRecipe.name: Cheesy Bread Sticks
defaultRecipe.description: Cheesy bread sticks made from greek yogurt crust
instructions: Combine dry ingredients with parmesan cheese and mix thoroughly, then add greek yogurt and kneed into dough
Brush the dough with oil and place dough inside
Fry at 400 for 8-10 minutes, flip and fry for another 3 minutes
Top with italian cheese and fry until cheese is melted. Cut into sticks when cooled

defaultRecipe.name: Tofu Nuggets
defaultRecipe.description: Vegan Tofu Nuggets
instructions: Drain tofu and press to remove excess water, some moisture should remain
Cut tofu into smaller blocks
Combine remaining ingredients and coat tofu, pressing to ensure a thorough coating
Spray frying basket and tofu with a light coating of cooking spray and fry at 400 for 10-12 minutes, shaking halfway through

defaultRecipe.name: Buffalo Chicken Tenders
defaultRecipe.description: Spicy buffalo chicken tenders
instructions: Slice chicken into tenders
Crack and mix eggs with buffalo sauce, add salt and pepper to flour in a separate bowl
Coat chicken in flour, then egg, then panko
Air fry at 400 for 10-12 minutes, flipping halfway through

defaultRecipe.name: Breakfast Crunchwrap
defaultRecipe.description: Crunchy tortilla wrap inspired by Taco Bell
instructions: Fold aluminum foil into patty size bowl (or use an oven safe dish) and coat with cooking spray
Crack egg into coated container and air fry at 350 for 3 minutes
Add bacon to air fryer and continue cooking until bacon is crispy, about 5 minutes
Remove egg patty and place on middle of tortilla (large size recommended), then add bacon and cheese
Carefully fold edges together and press, then put into air fryer with folds facing down
Air fry until tortilla is lightly browned and crispy, about 4 minutes

defaultRecipe.name: Breakfast Muffin
defaultRecipe.description: Breakfast sandwich inspired by the bacon & egg McMuffin
instructions: Fold aluminum foil into patty size bowl (or use an oven safe dish) and coat with cooking spray
Crack egg into coated container and air fry at 350 for 3 minutes
Add bacon to air fryer and continue cooking until bacon is crispy, about 5 minutes
Split english muffin and toast in air fryer for 3 minutes, then add egg, bacon, and cheese and toast until cheese is melted, about 3 minutes

defaultRecipe.name: Potato Chips
defaultRecipe.description: Air fried potato chips
instructions: Wash and peel potato and slice into thin slices with mandoline or vegetable slicer
Toss sliced potatoes with oil and salt, then fry on 360 for 15-17 minutes, tossing periodically

defaultRecipe.name: Crispy Broccoli
defaultRecipe.description: Asian inspired broccoli air fried to a crisp
instructions: Cut broccoli into bite-sized pieces (or use pre-cut thawed broccoli)
Combine other ingredients into bowl and mix, then add broccoli and let sit for at least 30 minutes
Fry at 400 until crispy and dark brown on edges, about 10 minutes, tossing halfway through

defaultRecipe.name: Crispy Curry Drumsticks
defaultRecipe.description: Curry seasoned drumsticks
instructions: In a large bowl, place chicken and enough water to cover. Add 1/2 teaspoon salt; let stand 15 minutes at room temperature. Drain and pat dry

Preheat air fryer to 375°. In a another bowl, mix oil, curry powder, onion salt, garlic powder and remaining 1/4 teaspoon salt; add chicken and toss to coat. In batches, place chicken in a single layer on tray in air-fryer basket. Cook until a thermometer inserted in chicken reads 170°-175°, 15-17 minutes, turning halfway through. If desired, sprinkle with cilantro.

defaultRecipe.name: Curried Roasted Potatoes
defaultRecipe.description: Curry seasoned potatoes
instructions: Preheat air fryer to 375 degrees F
Cut potatoes into about 1/2 inch round pieces
Place the sliced potatoes into a medium-sized mixing bowl, and mix the potatoes, olive oil, curry powder, salt, and black pepper, coating thoroughly
Pour potatoes into the air fryer basket and fry for 10 minutes, shaking halfway through

defaultRecipe.name: Curried Roasted Cauliflower
defaultRecipe.description: Curry seasoned cauliflower
instructions: Combine all of the ingredients in a large bowl and toss until the cauliflower is coated
Place the cauliflower in air fryer basket and bake at 400F for 10 to 15 minutes, shaking the basket every 5 minutes

defaultRecipe.name: Chicken Tikka
defaultRecipe.description: Indian style shicken
instructions: Chop the peppers in to chunks and thinly slice the onions
Chop the chicken breasts in to chunks
Add the peppers, onion, chicken, tikka seasoning and oil and mix
Put into air fryer at 300 for 18 minutes, shaking periodically until chicken is brown

defaultRecipe.name: Onion Rings
defaultRecipe.description: Curry seasoned cauliflower
instructions: Slice onion to make rings of desires size
Combine salt, paprika, and panko in a bowl
Combine milk and eggs and thoroughly mix
Coat onion in flour, then egg mixture, then panko mixture
Fry in single-layer batches at 375 for 10 minutes

defaultVendors.name: Kokua Market
defaultVendors.description: Kokua Market is Honolulu's first and only natural food's Coop.

defaultVendors.name: Nijiya Market
defaultVendors.description: Nijiya Market is a Japanese supermarket chain in America

defaultVendors.name: Safeway
defaultVendors.description: Longtime supermarket chain carrying brand-name & house-label groceries, plus a deli, bakery & more.

defaultProducts.name: Shredded Cheddar Cheese
defaultProducts.description: 8 Oz Bag of Lucerne Cheddar Cheese

defaultProducts.name: Bacon Bits
defaultProducts.description: Oscar Mayer Bacon Bits Real, 4.5 Oz
